body.name: Shark UZ565H Pro Cordless Vacuum w/ Clean Sense IQ & MultiFLEX Technology, PowerFins Plus Brushroll, Duster Crevice Tool & Anti-Allergen Dusting Brush, Up to 40 Minute Runtime, White/Blue (Renewed)
features: CLEAN SENSE IQ: An infrared sensor detects the dirt you can’t see and automatically increases power, giving you up to 50 Percent better dirt pickup*, visually indicating when floors are clean. *vs. SHARK Cordless Pro in ECO mode.

POWERFINS PLUS NOZZLE: Combines two brushroll technologies into one nozzle - soft microfibers handle stuck-on dust & piles of large debris, and PowerFins directly engage floors and dig deep into carpets.
MultiFLEX TECHNOLOGY: Flex the wand for access under furniture and freestanding storage.
POWERFUL SUCTION: HyperVelocity accelerated suction delivers incredible performance in an ultra-lightweight cordless.
LED DISPLAY: Real-time readouts to monitor battery, select suction levels, and engage Clean Sense IQ.
SELF-CLEANING BRUSHROLL: Powerful pet hair pickup and no more hair wrap.
UP TO 40 MINUTES OF RUNTIME: Removable battery can charge anywhere in your home, delivering up to 40 minutes of runtime. (In standard mode, measured at the hand vacuum.)
XL DUST CUP: Removable dust cup empties debris in seconds with a CleanTouch Dirt Ejector so you never get your hands dirty.
WHAT'S INCLUDED: SHARK Cordless Vacuum, Duster Crevice Tool and Anti-Allergen Dusting Brush.
body.description: The Shark Cordless Pro has the power and intelligence to change the way you clean. Clean Sense IQ detects the dirt you can’t see and automatically boosts power for up to 50% better dirt pickup*. Packed with powerful suction, this cordless vacuum deep cleans floors and carpets, capturing dirt, debris, and hair with its PowerFins Plus brushroll.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.3 4.3 out of 5 stars 491 ratings 4.3 out of 5 stars

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #272 in Amazon Renewed (See Top 100 in Amazon Renewed) #8 in Renewed Home & Kitchen #131 in Stick Vacuums & Electric Brooms

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light, agile, effective
reviews.reviewText: I like how light and maneuverable this machine is. Suction is great. Battery life is sufficient. I just wish there were extra batteries available. We use it in a parked vacation trailer. I was all set to finish cleaning and go home. I found the battery dead. Trailer is clean enough swept, but if I had an extra charged battery, that would have been nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Cool!!! And also a great cordless vacuum!!!
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use, easy to store, works great on all surfaces. My only complaint is that there is not a digital numerical battery status window. That would be helpful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have had cheap cordless vacuums in the past knowing full well they typically don’t clean as good as traditional plug in vacuums, but I am very happy with this vacuum! I bought it refurbished to save money and aside from some cosmetic damage, it works like it’s new. The dust bin is pretty small so I empty it out after each room but that doesn’t bother me at all. The run time on the vacuum is also pretty good, it lasts 30-40 minutes of continuous vacuuming. The battery does take a while to recharge again but that is technically my only “complaint”. I knocked it down from 5 stars because they *could* make a battery that lasts longer and doesn’t take hours to recharge, but other than that this is a great vacuum!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this vacuum
reviews.reviewText: I hate to vacuum but with a German Shepherd and hardwood floors, I have wisps of hair everywhere. This vacuum is so light and moves around everything. It is quick and easy to use and I vacuum around a large house and I still have power. Easy to charge, store and empty. I love it. Took a bit to get used to the many buttons but they are handy! My 2nd Shark but first stick vacuum. Surprised at the power.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this product!
reviews.reviewText: Great having no cords to worry about! Works great and easy to use, carry and clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a wonderful vacuum but I must warn you the battery does not last too long if you are using it for mostly carpet. I have a small house and I am able to vacuum everything on the floor, but I have to recharge the battery if I want to do base boards and furniture, otherwise it is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This would be a wonderful vacuum if it stayed on for more than five minutes. That's tops!
reviews.reviewText: I loved the fact that as an 86 year- old- woman, it is light and manueverable. But it doesn't stay on after I takke the battery off and wait a couple of hoours to start it up again. It dies shortly after again.. This isn't working for me or for anyone else.I really didn't know when I ordered it that it was repaired. I did check with vacuum handimen who repair them, but the cost is almost $50. That is not the price I should have to pay to have a new and working vacuum cleaner. Plus, suction power isn't good either.I could send it off to the original refurbishers but the cosst of mailing and also working on it, is even greater than leaving it with a vacuum handman in town.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for what it is
reviews.reviewText: It’s certainly not a top of the line model, but it was priced right, portable, cordless, and seems to do the job as intended. It is a little loud, but I didn’t by a whispering vacuum so I can tolerate that. It will last a full 40 mins in between charges and with that said, if you vacuum for more than 40 mins straight you need to find a new hobby!! Emptying the waste canister is a little on the complicated side in my non-Harvard opinion, but works just fine once you do it a couple times. Overall, it was a great buy for the 1200 sq Ft of carpet that was crying from all the crumbs and muck my children love to try and feed it. It was either the vacuum or a dog, and I chose the vacuum and am happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewTitle: Shark is the best and doesn't rob you for your money
reviews.reviewText: Rivals that other brand name that starts with a D and gouges you for ridiculous money. Great product, battery lasts a long time, does an excellent job.
